description:
Montreal, November 11, 2013 -- Using Plotly and iPython for Scientific Graphing by Chris Parmer from Plotly.

Useful links:

* Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
* Savoir-faire Linux: http://www.savoirfairelinux.com
title: Using Plotly and iPython for Scientific Graphing #MP41
